description: The Telangana Board of Intermediate Education has adjusted the 2026 Intermediate Public Examinations schedule for second-year students. This change accommodates a state holiday declared for Holi. Select exams originally set for March 3, 2026, will now take place on March 4, 2026. Practical exams are scheduled for February 2026. Admit cards will be available two weeks prior to the exams.

The incident, captured on video, sparked outrage over alleged police overreach. Authorities confirmed the transfer, emphasizing the need for personnel to act within their mandate and avoid unwarranted advice.

description: Ukraine's SBU security service announced a groundbreaking naval operation, claiming its Sub Sea Baby underwater drones have critically damaged a Russian submarine in Novorossiysk port. This marks the first time Kyiv has successfully targeted a Russian submarine, which reportedly carried Kalibr cruise missile launchers. The attack escalates naval warfare in the Black Sea, following recent strikes on Turkish cargo carriers.

title: India-Jordan ties: Crown Prince drives PM Modi to museum as special gesture — see pics

The two-day trip, aimed at boosting bilateral relations, includes discussions with King Abdullah II on various aspects of India-Jordan cooperation and regional issues.

description: A tragic accident occurred on the Agra-Lucknow Expressway. A speeding Fortuner car overturned near kilometre 241 in Unnao district. The vehicle crashed into boulders obscured by fog, leading to a sudden tyre burst. Four people lost their lives in the early morning incident. Police are working to identify the fourth victim. The accident happened around 5:15 AM.

Yamuna Expressway crash: Fog-fueled multi-vehicle crash kills 13
description: In a shocking turn of events early Tuesday, the Delhi-Agra Expressway near Mathura witnessed a devastating blaze as multiple buses caught fire, raising concerns for those on board. The incident occurred amid a thick veil of smog engulfing Uttar Pradesh, which severely compromised visibility, even obscuring the majestic Taj Mahal.

title: Party, police, panic: Woman jumps off 4th floor to escape cops visiting Bengaluru hotel
description: A 21-year-old woman sustained serious injuries after allegedly jumping from a hotel's fourth floor shortly after police arrived to address a nuisance complaint. Allegations of police misconduct, including a bribe demand, have surfaced, which authorities deny, stating videography is standard procedure. The woman's father has filed a complaint against the hotel for negligence.

title: Op Chakra-V: CBI cracks SIM-box fraud; 21,000 illegal SIMs used to spread fraud SMS
description: CBI busted a massive cybercrime network using over 20,000 illegally procured SIM cards, uncovering a 'phishing factory' in Delhi and Noida. The operation, 'Chakra-V', arrested three suspects and seized digital evidence, cash, and cryptocurrency. The firm, M/s Lord Mahavira Services India Pvt Ltd, allegedly facilitated bulk phishing messages by violating DoT rules.

title: Patrick Mahomes injury update: ACL tear spares other ligaments
description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes sustained a torn ACL in his left knee. An MRI scan revealed no other ligament damage. This offers positive news for his recovery. Mahomes expressed his determination to return stronger. Coach Andy Reid is optimistic about a swift rehabilitation if surgery is successful. Fans await his comeback.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind January market rout
description: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has restricted these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's earlier AI model launch at a lower cost had already raised concerns about China's rapid progress.
